SlightCSV
Simple and lightweight CSV parser library written in C++.

247  class slightcsv_error: public exception {};
248 
253  class slightcsv_filename_error: public slightcsv_error {
254 
255  const char* what() const throw() {
256  return "Wrong or missing filename.";
257  }
258 
259  };
260 
264  class slightcsv_separator_error: public slightcsv_error {
265 
266  const char* what() const throw() {
267  return "Wrong or missing separator.";
268  }
269 
270  };

275  class slightcsv_escape_error: public slightcsv_error {
276 
277  const char* what() const throw() {
278  return "Escape character not set.";
279  }
280 
281  };

286  class slightcsv_strip_error: public slightcsv_error {
287 
288  const char* what() const throw() {
289  return "Strip character set empty.";
290  }
291 
292  };

298

300  return "Replace character map empty.";

302 
303  };
304 
309  class slightcsv_format_cellcnt_error: public slightcsv_error {
310 
311  const char* what() const throw() {
312  return "CSV format error (cell count mismatch in row).";
313  }
314 
315  };
316 
319  class slightcsv_format_header_error: public slightcsv_error {
320 
321  const char* what() const throw() {
322  return "CSV format error (intermediate header).";
323  }
324 
325  };
326 
329  class slightcsv_data_error: public slightcsv_error {
330 
331  const char* what() const throw() {
332  return "Data not loaded.";
333  }
334 
335  };
336 
340  class slightcsv_index_error: public slightcsv_error {
341 
342  const char* what() const throw() {
343  return "Bad row or column index.";
344  }
345 
346  };
347 
350  class slightcsv_read_error: public slightcsv_error {
351 
352  const char* what() const throw() {
353  return "Unexpected error occurred while reading file.";
354  }
355 
356  };
